ca.mcgill.ecse211.poller

Class RingDetector

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.mcgill.ecse211.poller.RingDetector

  • public class RingDetector
extends java.lang.Object
    This class processes the colour sensor data and beeps for the ring detected
    Author:
    Edward Huang, Hugo Parent-Pothier, Sophie Deng

      • clearFoundRings

        public void clearFoundRings()
        This method clears the rings found. It allows the ringDetector to beep for rings previously found.

      • processRGBData

        public void processRGBData(float R,
                           float B,
                           float G)
        Processes RGB data to determine whether a ring has been detected or not. If the RGB data corresponds to a ring, the robot beeps a number of times depending on the colour of the ring that has been detected. Beeps one time for blue, two times for green, three times for yellow and four times for orange. Does not beep again if the ring has already been detected previously.
        Parameters:
        R - The red of the RGB data.
        B - The blue of the RGB data.
        G - The green of the RGB data.

      • getColourType

        public RingDetector.ColourType getColourType()
        Get the colour of the ring detected.
        Returns:
        The colour.
